page.title: 09STANDARD UPHOLSTERY
page.content: STANDARD UPHOLSTERY HAS BEEN ACTIVE FOR OVER TWENTY YEARS.THE COMPANY MAKES THREE PIECE SUITES AND EMPLOY ABOUT FORTY THREE PEOPLE.THE MANAGER OF STANDARD UPHOLSTERY SAID THEY WERE NOT THINKING OF EXPANDING YET.THE PEOPLE THAT OWN STANDARD UPHOLSTERY ARE A GROUP,THEY ARE THE BARDSLEY GROUP AND THEY HAVE OWNED IT FOR TWO AND A HALF YEARS. IN THE SUMMER IT IS VERY HOT IN THERE TO WORK.THE HOTEST TIME WAS IN 1976 WHERE THE PEOPLE HAD TO START AT SEVEN O'CLOCK AND FINISH AT TWELVE O'CLOCK.SO THEY DIDN'T MISS OUT ON WORK AND MONEY.STANDARD UPHOLSTERY MAKE OVER 5,200 THREE PIECE SUITES A YEAR.A PERSON AT THE FACTORY WAS ASKED WHAT IT WAS LIKE TO WORK THERE,HE REPLIED HE ENJOYED WORKING THERE AND HE HAS WORKED THERE FOR OVER TWENTY YEARS,HE ALONE MAKES ABOUT TWO SETTEE A DAY.
